description: This file initializes a vector database connection, creates a knowledge base from a PDF URL, and sets up an agent to process queries related to Thai recipes, executing asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and processes queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from a PDF URL and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client for Qdrant.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base asynchronously, with an option to recreate the data.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a query asynchronously, with optional markdown formatting.

calls: asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("How to make Tom Kha Gai", markdown=True))
